text.div:
TaskIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches based on the Task uuid field for the Task record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/Task?_id={uuid}

ResourceTask
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesTask
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: TaskIdSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the Task uuid field for the Task record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/Task?_id={uuid}
